RetrievalSummaryDefObject.name: RetrievalSummaryDefObject
RetrievalSummaryDefObject.description: Represents a table that stores the rollup definitions of a retrieval definition.

RecordAggregationDefinitionId.description: The rollup definition that determines the records to retrieve.

RetrievalSummaryDefinitionId.description: The ID of the related Retrieval Summary Definition.

SequenceNumber.description: The order that the rollup definition shows in the setup UI and API result.
